Row.Text: The wealthy reindeer breeders of the surrounding lands are cruel and greedy. We should steal some of their deer to teach them a lesson they won't soon forget, and to provide a grand feast for our followers![NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirements: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be The Nenets [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have a [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route with a [ICON_CITY_STATE] City-State [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]-30 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with a random [ICON_CITY_STATE] City-State you're trading with [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Has a chance to declare war on this [ICON_CITY_STATE] City-State [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]One [ICON_RES_DEER] Deer resource is spawned in your lands.

Requirements: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be The Nenets [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have a [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route with a [ICON_CITY_STATE] City-State [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]One [ICON_RES_DEER] Deer resource is spawned in your lands.

The climates of the Arctic Circle are increasingly harsh for our people! The development of a warm tent from the hides of our beloved deer could provide some much needed shelter for them.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirements: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be The Nenets [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must have researched Trapping [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Cost} [ICON_RESEARCH] Science [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 Magistrate [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production on Snow and Tundra tiles
Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production on Snow and Tundra tiles
